TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that belongs to the family of drugs called protease inhibitors. It interferes with the ability of a virus to make copies of itself.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "mesilato de saquinavir"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que es un tipo de inhibidor de la proteasa. Interfiere con la capacidad de un virus de hacer copias de s√≠ mismo.
